rule: Each description must avoid identifying the subjects and omit their characteristics such as appearance, attire, and actions.
output: Sunlight cascades through emerald canopy trees, dappling a moss-covered forest floor where vibrant wildflowers bloom.  Two butterflies, their wings painted with intricate patterns, dance amidst the blossoms. Golden rays pierce the dense foliage, casting long shadows as squirrels scamper amongst the roots. This peaceful scene exudes serenity and tranquility, capturing the essence of untouched wilderness.
